abstract: Alaska Moose Federation has authorization from state to pick up moose carcasses from roads and deliver them to hungry families or religious and civic groups that then butcher and distribute meat; organization says illegal carcass harvesting is on rise across Alaska; appeal of harvesting meat from roadkill is growing, and around 20 states have laws allowing it to greater or lesser degree.
lead_paragraph: Laurie Speakman and the Alaska Moose Federation have streamlined the harvesting of food from the roads. But increasingly, Alaskans aren’t following the rules.
snippet: Laurie Speakman and the Alaska Moose Federation have streamlined the harvesting of food from the roads. But increasingly, Alaskans aren’t following the rules....

headline.main: Laurie the Moose Lady Puts ‘Heart and Soul’ Into Roadkill
headline.print_headline: Laurie the Moose Lady Puts Heart Into Roadkill
